reviewText: I used this VHS YEARS ago in my high school English classroom, paired with "Into Thin Air". It was great for that purpose. But I have a question. Can someone who bought it tell me the name of the Buddhist musicians who provide the soundtrack? I used to have their cd, but lost both the movie and the music long ago, but I'd like to get it again. Thanks!

I purchased this DVD with the intent on being given an explanation on why people continue to risk their lives for such an adventure. I was greatly dissapointed. This DVD gave a sparse and short description of un named people climbing in a very generic way. Nothing new or exciting. I expected more, or even some griping detail of the hazards. I didn't get much I'm sorry to say.
Not long enough, felt like this was the quick tv version, found myself wanting more detailed info and content

Great DVD! A viewpoint that I have not seen from Everest.

A lot of information.
